User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the Inventory Ace application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the user account was created.

lastLogin.description: The date and time of the user's last login.

businessName.description: The name of the user's business.

assignedWarehouse.description: The ID of the warehouse the user is assigned to.

status.description: The status of the user account.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Represents a role within the application, such as Admin, Manager, or Staff.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Role entity.

name.description: The name of the role (e.g., Admin, Manager, Staff, Developer).

permissions.description: A map of permissions associated with this role.

Warehouse.title: Warehouse
Warehouse.description: Represents a physical warehouse or stock location.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Warehouse entity.

location.description: The address or location of the warehouse.

definition.description: Stores user data. Path-based ownership: only the user (or an admin/developer) can access their own document.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores role definitions. Admin/Developer access required to manage roles.

params.name: roleId
params.description: The unique identifier of the role.

definition.description: Stores warehouse information. Admin/Developer access required.

params.name: warehouseId
params.description: The unique identifier for the warehouse.
